title: Converse CONS Space 002 BLN : Music
description:
For a two week period in October, Converse took over three floors of an abandoned textile factory to create the second CONS Space with skaters, sculptors and live-in artists.

From legendary hip hop artist Redman kicking off the opening party to a piano concerto played to cult skate video classics, the CONS Space featured a diverse mix of genres clashing music with skate and art.

Also featuring the Chiwoks performinga live soundtrack to the release of latest skate movie from Thomas Campbell, Berlin based punk-rock band Modern Pets, and sound artist TEKA.
